description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. - Defend your green block against the army of red blocks who, for some unknown reason, are out to get you. - Use their own blue blocks against them to aid in your survival by unleashing a wave of destruction the likes of which you've never seen. - Stay alive as long as you can.  Good luck!  * I may be slightly over exaggerating the awesomeness of the wave of destruction....
description.short: - Defend your green block against the army of red blocks who, for some unknown reason, are out to get you. - Use their own blue blocks against them to aid in your survival by unleashing a wave of destruction the likes of which you've never seen. - Stay alive as long as you can.  Good luck!  * I may be slightly over exaggerating the awesomeness of the wave of destruction....
